page.name: Presentation: Formative Assessment
page.intro: Find out how to clarify and hone this element of your teaching in ways that strengthen differentiated instruction, universal design for learning, and self-regulated learning.
page.content:
Formative assessment goes hand-in-hand with lesson planning. Find out how to refine your use of formative assessment strategies in your teaching in ways that strengthen differentiated instruction, universal design for learning, and self-regulated learning.


[Transcript of Presentation]

Essential questions are mentioned in the presentation, download a list of those questions here.

Writing-to-learn prompts are listed in the presentation, download a pdf file of those here.

The CAST article, Getting from Here to There, is referenced in the presentation and also in the UDL course. Keep in mind the UDL principles as you "calculate a new route" based on students' understanding.
